title: Amanti d'oltretomba 1965 | Barbara Steele | A Vengeance That Won't Stay Buried.

sources.title: Amanti d'oltretomba 1965 | Barbara Steele | A Vengeance That Won't Stay Buried.
sources.description:
A mad, sadistic scientist on the loose!
A heated argument escalates, revealing secrets and resentment, leading to a plan for revenge, inheritance, and a mysterious woman. Concerns about sanity arise from a disturbing dream and a collection of ancestral artifacts. A woman feels trapped and scared in a castle, experiencing memory loss and strange events. Confusion and hallucinations plague a person, as a doctor tries to uncover the cause. Missing jewelry and the possibility of supernatural abilities are discussed. Strange occurrences in the castle cause fear and concern. Tension and suspicion lead to a decision to leave and seek a fresh start, but a conversation about a new life, blood, and a missing body takes a dark turn, resulting in a confrontation and a curse.

Original title: Amanti d'oltretomba (1965) 
AKA: The Faceless Monster / Lovers from Beyond the Tomb /Orgasmo

Colorized version https://youtu.be/UB3S0zlPkmM

Director: Mario Caiano
Writers: Mario Caiano, Fabio De Agostini
Stars: Barbara Steele, Paul Muller, Helga LinÃ©
Genres:  Classics, Gothic, Giallo, Horror
